评论详情: I assumed it’d get a pair but only received one but it’s cute and lightweight & also looks like little handcuffs.
These are very cute, but the hoop is too small for my piercing, which is all the way at the top of my ear, so there's definitely no way it would fit over my earlobe

The cuffs are cute and they are a bright silver so it catches your eye when you have the earrings in. They are a little bit small so if you have thick earlobes, it can be difficult to actually put them in. The hinge only opens so far, you might have to squish your ear lobe to get it to fit.  Other than that, they are cute and perfect and I will get lots of use of them.
the cuffs are wayyyyt to tiny

Earrings are cute and exactly what I was looking for, but they are NOT a pair of earrings.  What you get is 1 earring set, with 2 connected hoops to wear in 2 piercings in the same ear.  So if you want these for both ears, you need to order (and pay for) two of these.  Something to be aware of before you order.
It is way cool I love it
As advertised they are small but chain is long enough to fit in bottom ear piercings.  Wish they were a slightly  bigger.  However, they are really cute when worn in only one piercing.
